about_the_game:
Plunge headfirst into the mesmerizing depths of Cardboard Fish. Immerse yourself in this gripping third-person game that puts you in the fins of the unstoppable hero fish, Nozzle. Embark on an enthralling journey through a world intricately woven from the threads of physics itself. Brace yourself for an array of skill-based interactions and mind-bending puzzles that guarantee heart-pounding moments of progress and achievement.



As you step into Nozzle's aquatic shoes, you'll unveil the mysterious origins of the cardboard fish phenomenon. Unravel a narrative that unfolds progressively, beckoning you into its layers of depth and intrigue. Seamlessly navigate a series of challenges, tapping into your resourcefulness to unravel perplexing enigmas that dare to block your path.



Nozzle's uncanny knack for conquering the seemingly insurmountable will be your ultimate tool, paving the way for resilience in the face of adversity. No matter how tough the going gets, using Nozzle's unwavering determination and lightning-fast wit you will steer him toward triumph and liberation. Even the most formidable challenges crumble under Nozzle's determined spirit, revealing themselves as mere stepping stones on his journey to glory.



Prepare to dive headlong into a realm that blurs the boundaries between reality and imagination. Take the reins as you guide Nozzle through an unforgettable escapade fueled by curiosity, bravery, and an unyielding drive to conquer the uncharted. "Cardboard Fish" invites you to become an integral part of Nozzle's incredible narrative—a tale where inventive solutions conquer challenges and triumph emerges from steadfast perseverance.



Grab your controls and immerse yourself in this extraordinary adventure.

As you step into Nozzle's aquatic shoes, you'll unveil the mysterious origins of the cardboard fish phenomenon. Nozzle's uncanny knack for conquering the seemingly insurmountable will be your ultimate tool, paving the way for resilience in the face of adversity. No matter how tough the going gets, using Nozzle's unwavering determination and lightning-fast wit you will steer him toward triumph and liberation. Even the most formidable challenges crumble under Nozzle's determined spirit, revealing themselves as mere stepping stones on his journey to glory.



Prepare to dive headlong into a realm that blurs the boundaries between reality and imagination. Take the reins as you guide Nozzle through an unforgettable escapade fueled by curiosity, bravery, and an unyielding drive to conquer the uncharted. name: Cardboard Fish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Dive into the captivating world of Cardboard Fish! Experience gripping gameplay as Nozzle, the heroic fish, in a physics-based adventure filled with skill challenges and mind-bending puzzles for thrilling progress and achievement.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
